Label.en: It's perhaps his most famous piece...
Label.fr: Peut-être sa toile la plus célèbre...

Label.en: These days, he's considered a powerhouse of the French baroque

Label.en: But he wasn't always so famous...
Label.fr: Mais il n'a pas toujours été aussi célèbre...

Label.en: Well, he had a huge surge in popularity in the 20th century!
Label.fr: Il a connu un important regain de popularité au 20ième siècle !
